title: Strictly Come Dancing Finalists Are Chosen
summary: The final three dancers for Strictly Come Dancing have been picked after a dance-off on Sunday. Balvinder Sopal and Amber Davies were in the bottom two, and the judges decided to send Balvinder home. Amber will join George Clarke and Karen Carney in the final next week. Balvinder said she loved every minute of the show and thanked her partner Julian for helping her. The celebrities danced two times each on Saturday, and Karen got the highest score. The show also had a surprise for the hosts Tess and Claudia.

background_read: Strictly Come Dancing is a popular TV show in the UK where celebrities learn to dance with professional partners. Each week, they perform and judges give scores. The public votes for their favorites, and the couple with the lowest votes might have to do a dance-off. The judges then decide who stays and who goes home. The final is the last episode where the remaining couples compete to win the trophy.
Article_Structure: WHO: The celebrities Balvinder Sopal, Amber Davies, George Clarke, and Karen Carney, along with their dance partners and judges.
WHAT: The finalists for Strictly Come Dancing were chosen after a dance-off where Balvinder was eliminated.
WHERE: The show happens in a TV studio in the UK.
WHY: To decide who will compete in the final episode to win the competition.

perspectives.description: Balvinder Sopal felt happy about her experience and thanked her partner for support.
